sentence: I suppose we can go to the park this afternoon.
我想我们今天下午可以去公园。
She has a small birthmark on her left arm.
她的左臂上有一个小小的胎记。
The sun is very bright today, so I wear my sunglasses.
今天的阳光很明亮，所以我戴上了太阳镜。
My favourite fruit is strawberry because it is sweet.
我最喜欢的水果是草莓，因为它很甜。
The bus is always very crowded in the morning.
早上公共汽车总是非常拥挤。
The heavy rain caused a disaster in the small town.
大雨在这个小镇造成了一场灾难。
She studies very hard, therefore she gets good grades.
她学习非常努力，因此取得了好成绩。
Please cover your books with paper to protect them.
请用纸把你的书包起来以保护它们。
He did not go to the cinema, instead he stayed at home.
他没有去电影院，而是待在家里。
We played basketball instead of football yesterday.
我们昨天打篮球而不是踢足球。
Although it was raining, we still went for a walk.
虽然下着雨，但我们还是去散步了。
I need to go to the bathroom before we leave the house.
在我们离开家之前我需要去一下洗手间。
She quickly finished her homework and went out to play.
她很快完成了作业然后出去玩。
I am truly happy that you can come to my birthday party.
你能来我的生日聚会，我真的很开心。
We will paint the wall blue to match the new furniture.
我们要把墙刷成蓝色来配新家具。
He hasn't finished his project yet, but he will soon.
他还没有完成他的项目，但他很快会完成。
It might rain later, but we will go for a picnic anyway.
稍后可能会下雨，但无论如何我们都要去野餐。
I have already read this interesting book twice.
我已经把这本书有趣的书读了两遍。
Can you tell the difference between these two pictures?
你能说出这两张图片的区别吗？
I hate getting up early on cold winter mornings.
我讨厌在寒冷的冬晨早起。
After years of hard work, she became a successful writer.
经过多年努力，她成为了一名成功的作家。
We did a scientific experiment in the school lab yesterday.
我们昨天在学校实验室做了一个科学实验。
My grandfather always gives me wise advice about life.
我的祖父总是给我关于人生的明智建议。
The weather is perfect for flying a kite in the park today.
今天的天气非常适合在公园放风筝。
We sat in the front row to watch the school play.
我们坐在前排观看学校话剧。
His height makes him a good player on the basketball team.
他的身高让他成为篮球队的一名好队员。
We study English literature to learn about famous stories.
我们学习英国文学是为了了解著名的故事。
The main character in this film is a brave young girl.
这部电影的主角是一个勇敢的小女孩。
The wizard in the story used magic to help the poor people.
故事中的巫师使用魔法帮助穷人。
We use our brain to think, learn and solve problems.
我们用大脑来思考、学习和解决问题。
My mother taught me the value of honesty and hard work.
我母亲教会我诚实和努力工作的价值。
This shop sells clothes of good quality at fair prices.
这家店以公平的价格出售质量好的衣服。
Nothing is impossible if you put your heart into it.
如果你全心投入，没有什么是不可能的。
There is nothing in the box; it is completely empty.
盒子里什么都没有；它完全是空的。
She is reading a book about British history for her project.
她正在为她的项目读一本关于英国历史的书。
The young actress won an award for her first film.
这位年轻的女演员因她的第一部电影而获奖。
My grandmother gave me a beautiful silver necklace.
我的祖母给了我一条漂亮的银项链。
Many famous actors appear on the silver screen.
许多著名演员出现在银幕上。
I have no doubt that you will pass the English exam.
我毫不怀疑你会通过英语考试。
Some children have a fear of speaking in front of the class.
有些孩子害怕在全班面前讲话。
If you work hard, you will succeed in achieving your dreams.
如果你努力，你就会成功实现梦想。
She got an excellent score on her final science test.
她在最终的科学考试中取得了优异的分数。
He finished the race in second place, which is very good.
他以第二名的成绩完成了比赛，这非常好。
I felt satisfied after I finished cleaning my messy room.
在打扫完我凌乱的房间后，我感到很满意。
Swimming alone in the deep sea is a very risky thing to do.
独自在深海里游泳是一件非常冒险的事情。
The temperature dropped to zero degrees last night.
昨晚温度降到了零度。
Many athletes train for years to compete in the Olympics.
许多运动员为参加奥运会训练多年。
The young athlete runs every morning to stay fit and strong.
这位年轻的运动员每天早晨跑步以保持健康强壮。
He uses a stick to draw pictures in the sand on the beach.
他用一根棍子在沙滩上的沙子里画画。
You should stick to your plan if you want to finish on time.
如果你想按时完成，就应该坚持你的计划。
In the comic book, Superman can fly and has super strength.
在漫画书里，超人能飞并且有超强力量。
Please do not shout in the library; we must keep quiet.
请不要在图书馆大喊；我们必须保持安静。
We will meet at the school gate at three o'clock this afternoon.
我们今天下午三点在学校门口见面。
The workers will build a new playground for our school next month.
工人们下个月将为我们学校建造一个新操场。
She has lived in this city since she was five years old.
她从五岁起就一直住在这个城市。
He doesn't like coffee, nor does he like tea in the morning.
他不喜欢咖啡，早上也不喜欢茶。
There is a small hole in my sock, so I need to buy new ones.
我的袜子上有一个小洞，所以我需要买新袜子。
I am glad that you could come to my birthday party yesterday.
我很高兴你昨天能来我的生日聚会。
Remember to knock on the door before you enter the teacher's office.
进老师办公室前记得先敲门。
Be careful not to knock down the vase on the table.
小心别碰倒桌子上的花瓶。
My little sister is afraid of the dark, so she sleeps with a light on.
我的小妹妹怕黑，所以她开着灯睡觉。
I left a message on your desk to remind you about the meeting.
我在你桌上留了条信息提醒你开会。
We need a double room for my parents when they visit us.
我父母来看我们时我们需要一个双人间。
Good friends always show understanding when you have problems.
好朋友在你遇到问题时总是表示理解。
Please remember to return the library books by next Friday.
请记得在下周五前归还图书馆的书。
The music at the party was lively and made everyone dance.
聚会上的音乐很活泼，让每个人都跳起舞来。
Our classroom is big, but theirs is even bigger and brighter.
我们的教室很大，但他们的教室更大更明亮。
She got a good grade on her history test because she studied hard.
她历史考试取得了好成绩，因为她学习很努力。
I read an interesting article about space in the school magazine.
我在校刊上读了一篇关于太空的有趣文章。
The old photo of my family is priceless to me.
我的这张旧家庭照片对我来说是无价之宝。
The shop will offer a discount on all clothes this weekend.
这家店本周末所有衣服都会打折。
We need a good plan before we start the group project.
在我们开始小组项目前需要一个好计划。
It is quite cold outside today, so you should wear a coat.
今天外面相当冷，所以你应该穿件外套。
She felt stressed before the big exam, so she took a deep breath.
大考前她感到压力很大，所以她做了深呼吸。
We recently watched a very funny film at the cinema.
我们最近在电影院看了一部非常有趣的电影。
Many students learn English online through interesting videos.
许多学生通过有趣的视频在线学习英语。
My parents allow me to watch TV for one hour after dinner.
我父母允许我晚饭后看一小时电视。
I bought a ticket to see the new science exhibition.
我买了一张票去看新的科学展览。
It is true that regular exercise is good for your health.
经常锻炼对健康有益，这是真的。
We should respect our teachers and listen carefully in class.
我们应该尊重老师，上课认真听讲。
The path to the small village is very narrow and winding.
通往小村庄的小路非常狭窄且曲折。
Cyclists should use the bike lane for safety on the road.
骑车者应使用自行车道以保证道路安全。
Perhaps we can go swimming if the weather is sunny tomorrow.
如果明天天气晴朗，或许我们可以去游泳。
It's not good to argue with friends over small things.
为小事和朋友争吵是不好的。
We need to divide the cake into eight equal pieces for everyone.
我们需要把蛋糕分成八等份给每个人。
The river acts as a dividing line between the two towns.
这条河是这两个镇之间的分界线。
I cannot reach the book on the top shelf because I am too short.
我够不到书架顶层的书，因为我太矮了。
After discussion, we finally came to an agreement on the plan.
讨论之后，我们终于就计划达成了一致。
My uncle is a close relative who often visits us at the weekend.
我的叔叔是一位近亲，经常在周末来看我们。
The local government built a new hospital for the community.
当地政府为社区新建了一家医院。
She wrote a beautiful poem about spring for the school magazine.
她为校刊写了一首关于春天的美丽诗歌。
It's warm inside the house, but it's cold outside today.
今天房子里很暖和，但外面很冷。
Our neighbour is very kind and often helps us with our garden.
我们的邻居很友善，经常帮我们打理花园。
In the school play, he will act the role of a brave king.
在学校话剧里，他将扮演一位勇敢的国王。
I hope to pass all my exams at the end of this term.
我希望在这学期末通过我所有的考试。
You can call me whenever you need help with your homework.
无论何时你需要帮助做作业，你都可以给我打电话。
The teacher is always fair when she gives marks to students.
老师在给学生打分时总是很公平。
The children play football on the empty block near their homes.
孩子们在他们家附近的空地上踢足球。
The Christmas tree in our living room is artificial.
我们客厅里的圣诞树是人造的。
The old book is in very good condition for its age.
这本旧书就其年代而言保存状况非常好。
This new bicycle costs too much money for me to buy now.
这辆新自行车太贵了，我现在买不起。
Can you lend me your blue pen for the writing test?
你能把你的蓝笔借给我写作考试用吗？
We need a new printer because the old one is broken.
我们需要一台新打印机，因为旧的坏了。
Thomas Edison worked hard to invent the electric light bulb.
托马斯·爱迪生努力发明了电灯泡。
Can you weigh this bag of apples for me, please?
请问你能帮我称一下这袋苹果吗？
My little brother weighs twenty kilograms now.
我的小弟弟现在重二十公斤。
My father can fix my bicycle when the wheel is broken.
我父亲能在车轮坏了时修理我的自行车。
The telephone is an important invention that changed the world.
电话是一项改变了世界的重要发明。
You can download the song from the internet to your phone.
你可以从网上下载这首歌到你的手机上。
You need to apply for the job by sending an email first.
你需要先发电子邮件申请这份工作。
The kind man has a blind dog that helps him cross the street.
这位善良的男子有一只导盲犬帮他过马路。
This washing machine makes it easy to clean our clothes.
这台洗衣机让洗衣服变得容易。
The sign warns people not to swim in the deep part of the lake.
标志警告人们不要在湖的深水区游泳。
The strange object in the sky turned out to be a kite.
天空中的奇怪物体原来是一只风筝。
Dogs have a very good sense of smell and hearing.
狗有非常好的嗅觉和听觉。
Congratulations on winning first prize in the speech competition!
恭喜你在演讲比赛中获得一等奖！
I saw an advertisement for a new sports shop on television.
我在电视上看到了一个新运动商店的广告。
Wearing jeans and a T-shirt is my everyday style for school.
穿牛仔裤和T恤是我上学的日常风格。
I have trouble understanding this difficult maths problem.
我理解这道数学难题有困难。
She is very creative and often draws beautiful pictures.
她非常有创造力，经常画漂亮的画。
The children wrote an imaginative story about a magic land.
孩子们写了一个关于魔法之地的富有想象力的故事。
An inventor needs to have many creative ideas and work hard.
发明家需要有创造性的想法并努力工作。
English is widely used in many countries around the world.
英语在世界许多国家被广泛使用。
His curiosity about space led him to read many books about it.
他对太空的好奇心驱使他读了许多相关的书。
She has a natural talent for playing the piano very well.
她有弹好钢琴的天赋。
We use electricity to power lights, computers and televisions.
我们用电来为灯、电脑和电视供电。
We saw bright lightning during the heavy storm last night.
昨晚暴风雨期间我们看到了明亮的闪电。
The tall building has a lightning rod to keep it safe.
这座高楼有一个避雷针来保证安全。
He was a pioneer in exploring the deep forests of South America.
他是探索南美洲深林的先驱者。
Space exploration helps us learn more about the universe.
太空探索帮助我们更多地了解宇宙。
We have a short English test every Friday morning.
我们每周五上午有一个简短的英语测验。
Despite the rain, the football match continued as planned.
尽管下雨，足球比赛仍按计划进行。
Failure is not the end; it is a chance to learn and try again.
失败不是终点；它是一个学习和再尝试的机会。
In the future, I hope to become a helpful doctor.
未来，我希望成为一名有帮助的医生。
The famous explorer travelled to many unknown places.
这位著名的探险家去过许多未知的地方。
Climbing that high mountain alone is a big risk to take.
独自攀登那座高山是一个很大的风险。
My father will drive us to the beach for a picnic tomorrow.
我父亲明天会开车送我们去海滩野餐。
The earthquake caused some damage to buildings in the city.
地震对城市里的一些建筑造成了破坏。
I looked through the keyhole to see who was outside the door.
我透过钥匙孔看门外是谁。
Most people use digital cameras on their phones now.
现在大多数人用手机上的数码相机。
We live in the twenty-first century, which is full of technology.
我们生活在充满科技的二十一世纪。
I hope our friendship will last forever and never change.
我希望我们的友谊能永远持续，永不改变。
He uses his smartphone to read news and chat with friends.
他用智能手机看新闻和与朋友聊天。
I keep my money and bus card in a small red wallet.
我把钱和公交卡放在一个小红钱包里。
You can make a payment for the book online or in the shop.
你可以在网上或在店里为这本书付款。
I don't have enough cash to buy this new dictionary now.
我现在没有足够的现金买这本新字典。
There is a useful app for learning new English words.
有一个学习新英语单词的有用应用程序。
My mother put the cake in the oven to bake for thirty minutes.
我妈妈把蛋糕放进烤箱烤三十分钟。
Everyone in our class went to the museum except Tom.
除了汤姆，我们班每个人都去了博物馆。
It is very convenient to have a supermarket near our home.
我们家附近有个超市非常方便。
The rapid development of technology changes our lives quickly.
科技的快速发展迅速改变了我们的生活。
A mobile phone allows us to call people from almost anywhere.
手机让我们几乎能从任何地方给别人打电话。
You can sit anywhere you like in the classroom today.
今天你可以坐在教室里任何你喜欢的地方。
We need a great deal of water for the plants in the garden.
我们需要大量的水来浇灌花园里的植物。
We can send messages via email or through social media apps.
我们可以通过电子邮件或社交媒体应用程序发送信息。
He made good progress in English after practising every day.
经过每天练习，他在英语上取得了很大进步。
You can read the book offline after you download it to your tablet.
你把书下载到平板电脑后可以离线阅读。
Nowadays, many students use computers to do their homework.
如今，许多学生用电脑做作业。
You can simply click the button to start the game on the computer.
你可以简单地点击按钮在电脑上开始游戏。
I save some money every week to buy a new bicycle next year.
我每周存一些钱，以便明年买一辆新自行车。
One advantage of cycling is that it is good for your health.
骑自行车的一个好处是对健康有益。
The medicine had a good effect and made her feel better quickly.
这药效果很好，让她很快感觉好多了。
We use glue to stick the pieces of paper together for our project.
我们用胶水把纸片粘在一起做我们的项目。
He was glued to his phone and didn't hear his mother calling him.
他全神贯注地盯着手机，没听见妈妈叫他。
We heard a strange noise coming from the old house next door.
我们听到隔壁旧房子里传来奇怪的声音。
Please throw the rubbish into the bin to keep our classroom clean.
请把垃圾扔进垃圾桶以保持教室清洁。
Can you guess how many sweets are in this big glass jar?
你能猜出这个大玻璃罐里有多少颗糖吗？
Is there anyone in the classroom who can answer this question?
教室里有人能回答这个问题吗？
I share my bedroom with my younger sister, and we have two beds.
我和我妹妹共用一间卧室，我们有两张床。
I always finish my homework before I watch television in the evening.
我总是先完成作业，然后在晚上看电视。
The post office is opposite the bank on the main street.
邮局在主街上银行的对面。
She bought a packet of biscuits to share with her friends.
她买了一包饼干和朋友们分享。
We had a lovely picnic in the park with sandwiches and fruit.
我们在公园里吃了一顿愉快的野餐，有三明治和水果。
Please take the smelly rubbish out of the kitchen right now.
请现在就把厨房里发臭的垃圾拿出去。
My favourite sandwich has cheese, tomato and lettuce in it.
我最喜欢的三明治里有奶酪、番茄和生菜。
The noise from the construction site next door is very loud.
隔壁建筑工地的噪音非常大。
We should reduce the use of plastic bags to help the environment.
我们应该减少使用塑料袋以帮助环境。
He can kick the football very far because he practises a lot.
他能把足球踢得很远，因为他练习很多。
Please find your seat and sit down quietly for the lesson.
请找到你的座位，安静地坐下准备上课。
Every passenger on the bus must wear a seat belt for safety.
为了安全，公交车上的每位乘客都必须系安全带。
You can ask me anything about the homework if you don't understand.
如果你不明白，可以问我任何关于作业的问题。
Only a fool would go swimming in such cold weather.
只有傻瓜才会在这么冷的天气去游泳。
The sign says 'Stop', so all cars must wait here.
标志上写着'停'，所以所有汽车必须在这里等待。
I have a sore throat, so I drank some warm tea with honey.
我喉咙痛，所以我喝了一些加蜂蜜的热茶。
He cleared his throat before starting his speech to the class.
他在开始向全班演讲之前清了清嗓子。
It is our responsibility to keep our school clean and tidy.
保持学校干净整洁是我们的责任。
Eating too much sugar can cause health problems like toothache.
吃太多糖会导致如牙痛等健康问题。
He wore a black leather belt with his new blue jeans.
他穿新蓝色牛仔裤时配了一条黑色皮带。
Always fasten your seat belt when you are in a moving car.
乘坐行驶的汽车时，一定要系好安全带。
We will meet at the train station at eight o'clock tomorrow morning.
我们明天早上八点在火车站见面。
My grandmother grows small red flowers in a clay flowerpot.
我祖母在陶土花盆里种小红花。
I will pick up my little brother from his school at four o'clock.
我四点会去学校接我弟弟。
Please tidy up the mess in your room before your friends come.
在你的朋友们来之前，请把你房间的杂乱收拾一下。
Honesty is very important; we should always tell the truth.
诚实非常重要；我们应该永远说实话。
We spread the map on the table to plan our trip to the city.
我们把地图铺在桌子上计划我们的城市之旅。
It is the law that you must not drive a car without a licence.
法律禁止你无证驾驶。
The lawyer helped the man understand his rights in the court.
律师帮助这位男子了解他在法庭上的权利。
I have an urgent message for you from your mother, please call her.
我有一个你母亲发来的紧急口信，请给她打电话。
As a good citizen, you should follow the rules of the society.
作为一个好公民，你应该遵守社会规则。
Just click on the icon to open the program on your computer.
只需点击图标即可在电脑上打开程序。
We learn basic maths like addition and subtraction in primary school.
我们在小学学习加法和减法等基础数学。
My diary is personal, so I don't let anyone else read it.
我的日记是私人的，所以我不让其他人看。
This is a private beach, so only hotel guests can use it.
这是一个私人海滩，所以只有酒店客人可以使用。
To avoid being late, we left home thirty minutes early.
为了避免迟到，我们提前三十分钟离开了家。
Please write your name and address clearly on the application form.
请在申请表上清楚地写下你的姓名和地址。
You need a passport to travel to a foreign country.
你需要护照才能去外国旅行。
There is a speed limit on this road to keep drivers safe.
这条路上有限速以确保驾驶员安全。
He was careless and lost his new pencil case on the bus.
